court.center: Criminal Court of Appeals of Oklahoma.

opinion.posture: Petition of Olin Robinson for writ of habeas corpus. Cause dismissed.
opinion.attorneys:
Hall Pickens and G. Arthur Holloway, for petitioner.
The Attorney General, for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text: This is a petition for writ of habeas corpus of Olin Robinson, to be admitted to bail pending an appeal from a judgment of the county court of Hughes county. A rule to show cause issued and before the cause was submitted counsel of record in open court moved to dismiss the same. It is therefore ordered that said cause be and is hereby dismissed.Page 433
